perturbation.original_text: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER maintain the software for an additional five years.
perturbation.changed_text: 1. EXTENSION OF SERVICE AGREEMENT. Subject to all other terms and conditions set forth herein, as of the date of this agreement, LEADER may maintain the software for an additional period as determined by EZJR.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states LEADER 'maintain the software for an additional five years,' creating a firm obligation. The modified text changes 'maintain' to 'may maintain' and specifies that the duration is 'as determined by EZJR,' thereby removing LEADER's guaranteed right to the extension and giving EZJR sole discretion. This contradicts the original intent of a fixed five-year extension and creates uncertainty about LEADER's service period.

perturbation.original_text: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, the prevailing party will be entitled to recover reasonable attorney's fees and other costs incurred in that action or proceeding, in addition to any other relief to which it or he may be entitled.
perturbation.changed_text: 11. ATTORNEYS' FEES. Each party will pay its or his own legal fees and other expenses in connection with the preparation of this Agreement and the sale of Assets in accordance with this Agreement. However, if any legal action or other proceeding is brought for the enforcement of this Agreement, or because or arising out of an alleged dispute, breach, default or misrepresentation in connection with any of the provisions of this Agreement, each party shall bear its own attorney's fees regardless of the outcome.
perturbation.explanation: The original text provides that the prevailing party in a legal dispute will recover attorney's fees. The modified text adds 'each party shall bear its own attorney's fees regardless of the outcome.' This directly contradicts the 'prevailing party' provision, creating uncertainty about who is responsible for legal fees in case of a dispute.

perturbation.original_text: 7. AMENDMENT. No supplement to or amendment of this Agreement will be binding unless executed in writing by LEADER and EZJR.
perturbation.changed_text: 7. AMENDMENT. This agreement can be amended through written agreement between LEADER and EZJR or, unilaterally by EZJR providing written notice to LEADER.
perturbation.explanation: The original text says amendments require written agreement from both LEADER and EZJR, creating a mutual obligation. The modified text adds that EZJR can unilaterally amend the agreement by providing written notice. This contradicts the original text, potentially causing disputes.
